title: Immunesystem - Project Best Life
author: Team Best Life
cleaned_text: Essential Oils](https://projectbestlife.org/2019/08/the-essentials-to-nose-about-essential-oils/) Essential oils give a whole new meaning to Spiderman's catch phrase "my spidey-senses are tingling." That's because activating our senses with certain aromas can possibly lead to superpower benefits such as decreasing stress, increasing concentration
